schema:creator: Falyn, Dezla & Falyn, Skye
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ This is a picture of my sister modeling my coronavirus hat. I love knitting and have knit over 25 hats since march but when I saw this hat it reminded me of the virus that was keeping me indoors knitting so much so it was immediately named the coronavirus hat.  
 __Participant age:__ 19, 15  
 __Category:__  Family Art (collaborative piece from members of same family)
schema:name: Coronavirus Hat
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
